title: SQL Portfolio & Analytics Practice
short_summary: Mixed SQL portfolio combining query challenges and applied analytics use cases
summary: A comprehensive SQL portfolio combining algorithmic SQL challenges with applied analytics work. Includes query-based problem solving, exploratory analytics, and business-focused SQL use cases designed to demonstrate proficiency in relational data modeling, performance-aware querying, and analytical reasoning.

components.name: Algorithmic SQL Challenges
components.objective: Strengthen SQL problem-solving skills through structured query challenges
components.business_value: Demonstrates ability to write correct, efficient SQL under analytical constraints

components.name: Applied SQL Analytics Use Cases
components.objective: Apply SQL to answer business and performance questions using real or realistic datasets
components.business_value: Shows ability to translate raw data into actionable insights using SQL
